definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/summon lightning_bolt ^ ^ ^5</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">global:abilityTimerSec</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_remove_xp_level"><value name="xpamount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1.5</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
